details.title: Photoelectric Detection of Coherent Light in Filtered Background Light
details.abstract: The probability is calculated of detecting coherent light in the presence of background light that has passed through a narrow-band filter of either rectangular or Lorentz frequency characteristic. Both signal and background fall on a photoelectric surface whose emitted electrons are counted and subjected to a randomized decision procedure that yields a preassigned false-alarm probability.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems
